meanings.definition: The landing of a spacecraft in the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The splashdown of the spaceship was a success.
meanings.sent2: The astronauts cheered as they witnessed the splashdown of their capsule.
meanings.sent3: The fish in the ocean were surprised by the splashdown of the spaceship.
meanings.sent4: The splashdown of the spacecraft was like a giant water balloon bursting.
meanings.sent5: The splashdown created a beautiful ripple effect in the water.

meanings.definition: The act of landing in water with a splash.
meanings.sent1: The kids enjoyed the splashdown as they jumped into the pool.
meanings.sent2: The diver made a perfect splashdown into the lake.
meanings.sent3: The ducks quacked happily at the splashdown of the stones in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The rain made a gentle splashdown on the roof.
meanings.sent5: The splashdown of the watermelon on the ground made everyone laugh.
